name: js_project
description: ##Background Go Green is an educational game that teaches people how to sort and recycle the trash correctly. The game is designed based on the soccer game theme. There will be three bins labeled as trash, compost, and recycle setting up in front of the player. The player will kick the trash to the correct bin every time. There will be an evil monster as goalkeeper to try to catch the trash when the player is kicking. A scoreboard will display the score of the player based on the correct sorted trash.
